API to retrieve information about a scheduled payment.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["action","client_key","schedule_id","hash"],"properties":{"action":{"type":"string","enum":["SCHEDULE_INFO"],"description":"Action to get a schedule info - fixed value"},"client_key":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique key (CLIENT_KEY)"},"schedule_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Schedule ID in the Payment Platform"},"hash":{"type":"string","description":"Special signature to validate your request (see Appendix A, Formula 4)"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response with schedule information","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"action":{"type":"string","example":"SCHEDULE_INFO"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Monthly Subscription"},"interval_length":{"type":"integer","example":1},"interval_unit":{"type":"string","example":"month"},"day_of_month":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"example":15},"payments_count":{"type":"integer","example":12},"delays":{"type":"integer","example":0},"paused":{"type":"string","enum":["Y","N"],"example":"N"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - invalid hash"},"404":{"description":"Schedule not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
